summary: Adds a new fantastic looking player home to Solstheim. Yes requires Dragonborn DLC
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://img3.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/nahkin1kb2rpejd0.jpg[/img]

[color=#9cdbff][size=+3]MESOS THUUM[/size][/color]
[size=+2][center][i]\"Mesos Thuum a fortress of Solitude. Miraaks long forgotten outpost. It was once build with the intention to serve the Dragonborn. After he turned evil, it became forgotte. Now it\'s time for another Dragonborn to claim the fortress and it\'s benefits....\"[/i][/center][/size]


[img]http://img3.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/descriptionq0gb4opj2f.jpg[/img]

This mod adds a new unique designed home to Solstheim. Yes you are guessing right this house mod needs [color=#9cdbff]Dragonborn DLC[/color].
After a longer time of not releasing any of my mods, I thought it would be time to release some of them now. Mesos Thuum is one of the greater projects I\'ve been working on. Currently you will find a map Marker to explore on Solstheim. I thought it would also be cool to have a story behind the house mod or the fortress, but I am not really good at such things. So if anyone would want to make a story or small quest or sth. like the I would be very greatful.

I really hope you like it as I invested a lot of time and detail into it.
I am also planning to release more updates or other projects I\'ve been working on in the past months.

[color=cyan]Location[/color]
---------

Just go to Solstheim and open the map. The house has a significant Map marker and is free to explore for you. Or look on the Screenshots, where to find it.

Well now let\'s go to the interesting part the Feautres of the mod.


[img]http://img3.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/features8g1n0qwkjv.jpg[/img]

Generally I would advice you to look the pics or download it, because they can say more than my words :D.
And it\'s:
-) cleaned with [color=cyan]Tes5Edit[/color]
-) [b]full[/b] Navmeshed !!

[color=#9cdbff]The ice cave:[/color]
----------------

-) unique look of interior
-) handplaced objects and a lot of detail
-) Storage area
-) Frozen bridge
-) unique looking Tree
-) Cool entrance
-) massive Mountain
-) lots of effects like Raindrops, Wind, Water and so on
-) Storage
-) Mannequins
-) Bed inside the ice cave
-) unique smithery (Icefire style)
-) unique cooking area (also icefire style)
-) food storage
-) DAMN cool looking tree with lots of ice and lanterns.
-) Statues (fixed with chains, so no hanging around or beeing in an angle with no fixation)
-) New Portals with sound to transport you.


[color=#9cdbff]The little house:[/color]
----------------

-) house with fine design and new objects
-) same design as outside
-) 2 weapon racks
-) 3 more Mannequins
-) Bed for those who don\'t want to sleep like real tough Dragonborns ;)
-) Alchemy area with also some unique designs


[color=#9cdbff]Other Features:[/color]
----------------

I tried to place the object in the world with most immersion possible. I tried to make an appropriate Entrance and also a second entrance.
The whole design of the ice cavern and fortress of Solitude is going (hopefully) through the whole project.

I got inspired after I seen some of the new Icebergs and Icecaves Solstheim offers.


[img]http://img3.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/installation365egco2nb.jpg[/img]

Either use NMM to install it or dorp the content of the Data folder into your Skyrim Data Folder.
-->  MesosThum.bsa and MesosThum.esp

[img]http://img3.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/uninstallationufond5k2z4.jpg[/img]

Remove the following two files from your Skyrim/Data folder or use NMM do uninstall it.
-->  MesosThum.bsa and MesosThum.esp


[img]http://img3.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/faqvhgbflr67j.jpg[/img]

[color=cyan]Q:[/color]Is this mord immersive ?
[color=blue]A:[/color]I tried it atleast. Well for people who use Hypothermia I guess not, but I tried my best to fit all wishes

[color=cyan]Q:[/color]Is this mod cleaned ?
[color=blue]A:[/color]Definatly yes. I\'ve cleaned it with Tes5Edit (great and awsome tool)

[color=cyan]Q:[/color]Can I bring my followers there?
[color=blue]A:[/color]I dunno but I guess it will work. As I fully navmeshed it. I\'ve put a lot of work into it and detail


[img]http://img3.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/updatefimyd8wp2q.jpg[/img]

I\'ve planed on adding sth. depending on the interest in this mod. Or if sth. flows into my mind


[img]http://img3.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/versionhistory0dcoqnr28i.jpg[/img]

[b]Version 1.0:[/b]
Initial release


[img]http://img3.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/creditsndtxb49hzg.jpg[/img]

Blary for his fantastic resources I used
Oaristys & Tony67 for their fantastic Modders Resource pack
Bethesda for creation of the game and the CK

It\'s not allowed to upload this file to Steam or somewhere else. The only two locations where you will find this mod are:
---> [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com]Skyrimnexus[/url]
---> [url=http://www.tesalliance.org]TES Alliance[/url]

You can use the resources of this mod if you give proper credit to the original authors. 
Please ask me if you want to use sth. of the mod, I\'ll say yes but wanna know what you do.


[img]http://www.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/othermodshsn196alb4.jpg[/img]

This Image can be copied and posted in your mod Description. It should help small mods (that are worth it) or mods that you think are underated, to get more attention.
Just copy the following line to your mod description and embed it at the end or somewhere you want. Afterwards just write the mods or link you want to mention

[color=orange][u]Image: [/u][/color] [\"img]http://www.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/othermodshsn196alb4.jpg[/img\"] (without the quotes \"\\\")

[u]My other mods: [/u]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3507075]Nahkins mods[/url]

[u]Power of the Stars: [/u]
Great mod! 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27621]Power of the Stars[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/258945]Insanitys mods[/url]
author: Nahkin
